description-1: maquinua is the website to find all the vending machines in the Universitat d'Alacant / Universidad de Alicante. Filter the maching by name, price or location. Find the localisation of the vending machine on the map.
find-us: Contact us using our GitHub repository at
nosotros_miua: Hello! We are MIUA and we offer solutions in the form of interactive maps for the University of Alicante.
Presentamos ahora MaquinUA: Introducing MaquinUA, an interactive map showing the exact location of all vending machines at UA.
Mi compromiso con el diseño web: My commitment to web design and my frontend development skills are essential contributions to the team.
Mi pasion por las redes: My passion for networks and my backend knowledge make me a key player.
Tengo una amplia variedad: I have a wide variety of knowledge in both frontend and backend. I can assist with all kinds of tasks.
Me apasionan las bases: I'm passionate about databases and communication networks. My passion for work is unmatched.
Me apasiona aprender: I'm passionate about learning more and being able to contribute all I can to the team.
Altos conocimientos: High expertise in both backend and frontend development. I love giving my all to the team.
Me apasiona ayudar: I'm passionate about helping my team and bringing all my web development knowledge.
